hero_headline: Your Smart Digital Guide for Security & Safety Services
hero_subheadline: First Saudi platform combining digital speed with engineering expertise
hero_hook: Save search effort, get quotes from certified companies. Compare, choose, execute — all online and free
hero_challenge_new: A simple price quote request… why does it always turn into an endless search? You can compare price quotations through us.
hero_challenge_sub_new: Every facility starts with a clear request, but ends up drowning in endless calls and delays
solution_title: How does OFF FIRE ONLINE change the game?
solution_subtitle: Turn chaos into smart system... in less than 3 minutes
sectors_title: First Security Partner... for All Sectors
why_us_title: Why is OFF FIRE ONLINE your smart choice?
hero_challenge_sub: Suffering from price variance and lack of transparency?
hero_solution_sub: Your #1 Digital Intermediary. Connecting you with elite certified companies.
srv_1_long: Complete fire fighting solutions including site study, hydraulic design, supply and installation of sprinkler networks and gas systems (FM200/Novec).
srv_1_feat_3: Clean gas systems for sensitive rooms
srv_2_long: Alarm systems are the first line of defense. We provide the latest Addressable and Conventional panels linked with Civil Defense 'Salamah'.
srv_3_long: Supply of all safety equipment: UL/FM or Local fire pumps, fire extinguishers, fire cabinets, and industrial security supplies.
srv_4_long: Integrated engineering services including Safety Plans, Shop Drawings, Hydraulic Calculations, and approvals.
srv_5_long: We handle complex procedures. Issuance and renewal of Civil Defense licenses (Salamah), file opening, and resolving violations.
quote_subtitle: Fill the form and we will contact you instantly

success_desc: Sales team will contact you within hours.

onb_2_title: We Collect For you Offers From Certified Companies Only
onb_2_desc: Connecting you with elite safety companies.
onb_3_desc: From restaurants & cafes to large factories.
try_different_search: Try a different search or filter
contact_experts: Contact our experts to design a solution tailored to your specific needs
faq_subtitle: Answers to the most common questions
faq_answer_1: Yes. All our basic services are completely free, including quote requests, comparisons, and initial consultations.
faq_question_2: Are the listed companies actually certified?
faq_answer_2: Yes. We verify the licenses and accreditations of every company and engineering office before listing them on our platform.
faq_question_3: Can I compare more than one quote?
faq_answer_3: Yes. You'll get a clear comparison of multiple quotes in terms of quality, cost, and technical specifications.
faq_question_4: I don't know the requirements for my facility, can you help?
faq_answer_4: Yes. The smart evaluation system automatically determines technical requirements based on activity type and facility area.
faq_question_5: Do you cover all regions of the Kingdom?
faq_answer_5: Yes. We cover all cities, and automatically connect you with the nearest certified companies to your project location.
faq_question_6: How long does it take to get a quote?
faq_answer_6: Within 24 working hours maximum. Usually responses come within hours.
faq_question_7: Can I track my request after submitting it?
faq_answer_7: Yes. You'll receive updates via WhatsApp and email about your request status.
faq_question_8: What if I'm not satisfied with the service?
faq_answer_8: We guarantee complete satisfaction. If you're not satisfied, we'll find alternatives for you at no additional cost.
support_available: Support team available 24/7 to answer your inquiries
privacy_section1_content: At OFF FIRE ONLINE, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and share your personal information when you use our platform.
privacy_section2_content: We collect information you provide directly such as name, phone number, email, and request details. We also automatically collect information about your use of the app.
privacy_section3_content: We use your information to provide services, improve your experience, communicate about your requests, and send important updates.
privacy_section4_content: We do not sell your information to third parties. We only share it with certified companies to provide requested services, in compliance with Saudi laws.
privacy_section5_content: We use appropriate security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.
privacy_section6_content: You have the right to access, correct, delete your information, or withdraw consent. To do so, contact us at info@offfire.online
terms_section1_content: By using the OFF FIRE ONLINE platform, you agree to comply with these terms and conditions. If you do not agree, please do not use the platform.
terms_section2_content: We are a digital intermediary connecting customers with certified security and safety companies. We do not provide services ourselves, but help find accredited service providers.
terms_section3_content: We verify the accreditations of listed companies, but ultimate responsibility for service quality lies with the service provider. We act as an intermediary and do not assume direct execution responsibility.
terms_section4_content: Platform use is free for customers. Certified companies may charge fees for their services according to direct agreement between customer and service provider.
terms_section5_content: All information provided must be accurate and correct. We reserve the right to reject or cancel any request containing incorrect information.
terms_section6_content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. You will be notified of changes through the app or email.
terms_acceptance: By continuing to use the app, you agree to the updated terms and conditions.
privacy_intro: We protect your privacy and strive to ensure the security of your information at every step.
privacy_contact_desc: We welcome your inquiries and feedback about the privacy policy
terms_notice: Please read the terms and conditions carefully before using the platform
